name: We need you, Borro! - Prototipe Demo
name_original: We need you, Borro! - Prototipe Demo
description:
We strongly recommend to play the game using a Controller.

"We need you, Borro!" is an adventure game, inspired by the classic Pang.

Borro has lost his beloved stone, his only friend and love. The search for his stone takes him to far, far away places... This is an adventure full of interdimensional travels and terrifying furry bouncers!

Keyboard controls:

  • Movement: WASD
  • Shoot: K
  • Dash: L
  • Shield: Q (when unlocked)
  • Pause: P

This is an early prototipe of a game that was in development during 2~ years. This prototipe is not perfect, and we know it. The game wasn't finished, but all the team learnt a lot about making videogames during the development. Thank you!
